title: Pixel 3a became slow since Jan, frequent stuttering lags. Anyone facing the same?
content:
Pixel 3a became slow since Jan 2021 first week. Frequent stuttering lags while using apps.

No new app installed since Jan. 
OS / Security Update / Google Play System Update / Apps - all are up to date.
25% storage available.
Background apps closed, only couple of apps active.
Cache cleared for most apps.
Phone restarted.
Phone restarted in Safe Mode.

Still facing frequent stuttering lags.
Anyone facing the same?
